algorithms.imageProcessing

Class EdgeContourExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.imageProcessing.EdgeContourExtractor

  • public class EdgeContourExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    Edge contour extraction Local Methods: (1) At each edge pixel, a neighborhood (e.g., 3x3) is examined. (2) The center edge pixel can be linked with its neighbors if the magnitude and direction differences are below certain thresholds and their magnitudes are relatively large:
    Author:
    nichole

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EdgeContourExtractor(GreyscaleImage input)
      NOTE: input should have a black (empty) background and edges should have blue > 125 counts.

    • Method Detail

      • useLineDrawingMode

        public void useLineDrawingMode()

      • getImage

        public GreyscaleImage getImage()

      • findEdges

        public java.util.List<PairIntArray> findEdges()
        find the edges and return as a list of points. The method uses a DFS search through all points in the image with values > 0 to link adjacent sequential points into edges. The method then uses method mergeAdjacentEndPoints. Note that the later 2 methods are not needed if the edges will be used in a corner detector only, but if the edges are to be used to find inflection points in scale space maps, those methods help to provide more complete shapes and better matches between the same object in another scale space map.
        Returns:

      • doNotStraigthenLines

      • findClosestPair

        protected double findClosestPair(PairIntArray curve0,
                     PairIntArray curve1,
                     int[] curve0Idx,
                     int[] curve1Idx)
        find the closest point between the curve0 and curve1 and return the points in curve0XY and curve1XY along with the method return value which is the separation.
        Parameters:
        curve0 -
        curve1 -
        curve0Idx - output variable to hold index to the (x, y) of the point in curve0 which is closest to curve0
        curve1Idx - output variable to hold index to the (x, y) of the point in curve0 which is closest to curve1
        Returns:
        the separation between the closest pair of points in curve0 and curve1
